acf8e4f4-af02-430c-9f40-65b805b55876 Leave to simmer
f90cbd9d-bf80-483a-bf95-823a2e394df2 In a medium bowl combine turmeric powder, paprika, cumin, thyme, crushed red pepper flakes, ground black pepper, salt, and 1 tbsp olive oil.
f90cbd9d-bf80-483a-bf95-823a2e394df2 Add shrimp to the bowl, and mix well to coat.
f90cbd9d-bf80-483a-bf95-823a2e394df2 In a large deep sauté pan, heat 1 tbsp of olive oil over medium heat and add the shrimp.
f90cbd9d-bf80-483a-bf95-823a2e394df2 Cook shrimp until it's cooked through, then add garlic in the last minute but make sure that it does not burn.
f90cbd9d-bf80-483a-bf95-823a2e394df2 Remove from heat, and squeeze lime over shrimp. Serve with Tilda Caribbean Rice and Peas and a simple salad on the side.
93844e97-165b-435d-b2e4-87d028f0af42 Marinate tofu in baharat and sunflower oil, chop shallots, garlic, aubergine and courgettes
087dd928-e3c6-4969-9339-f4f470ea339d Marinate halloumi with sumac, baharat and sunflower oil. Separately, fry off the mushrooms, cauliflower, green beans, red onion and garlic
087dd928-e3c6-4969-9339-f4f470ea339d Toss together the lemon, sweetcorn, onion, fennel and olive oil
087dd928-e3c6-4969-9339-f4f470ea339d Add halloumi to pan and fry. Separately, to make the salad, chop up orange chunks, apricots, dill and fennel
087dd928-e3c6-4969-9339-f4f470ea339d Add the rice to the vegetables and add a squeeze of lemon and olive oil. Slice some avocado and lettuce
087dd928-e3c6-4969-9339-f4f470ea339d Toast the tortillas in a pan, then fold and serve with the rice in lettuce boats
6c0a220e-9738-4580-8ada-b4e204951315 Preheat the oven to 180 C.
6c0a220e-9738-4580-8ada-b4e204951315 Grind together the spices with half the lime.
6c0a220e-9738-4580-8ada-b4e204951315 Coat the salmon, wrap in foil and bake for 20-25 minutes
6c0a220e-9738-4580-8ada-b4e204951315 Meanwhile cook your greens in salted boiling water for 8 minutes.
6c0a220e-9738-4580-8ada-b4e204951315 Heat the rice as per the instructions on the pack.
6c0a220e-9738-4580-8ada-b4e204951315 Bring together the cooked salmon with your rice and greens.
6c0a220e-9738-4580-8ada-b4e204951315 Garnish with the rest of the lime, sliced red chilli and a sprinkle of fresh coriander.
b9397676-f21e-44fc-bacb-f8b6bcdff460 Heat the oil in a pan over medium heat
b9397676-f21e-44fc-bacb-f8b6bcdff460 Add in the onion, celery, pepper, sweet potato, bay leaf and 2 tbsp. water
b9397676-f21e-44fc-bacb-f8b6bcdff460 Sauté for 10 mins until the onion is softened
b9397676-f21e-44fc-bacb-f8b6bcdff460 Stir in the garlic and ginger, followed by the allspice, paprika and cayenne pepper
b9397676-f21e-44fc-bacb-f8b6bcdff460 mix in the tomato, stock and thyme, and bring to the boil
b9397676-f21e-44fc-bacb-f8b6bcdff460 Cover and reduce to simmer for 35 mins or until the sweet potato is cooked through
b9397676-f21e-44fc-bacb-f8b6bcdff460 Adjust seasoning and switch off the heat
b9397676-f21e-44fc-bacb-f8b6bcdff460 Cook the rice as per the instructions on the pack
b9397676-f21e-44fc-bacb-f8b6bcdff460 Ladle the soup into bowls then stir in the rice
b9397676-f21e-44fc-bacb-f8b6bcdff460 Garnish and serve
a3dabebd-fd37-4cba-878b-51c3083e5296 Pre-heat the oven to 190°c, Gas Mark 5
a3dabebd-fd37-4cba-878b-51c3083e5296 Mix together all the marinade ingredients
a3dabebd-fd37-4cba-878b-51c3083e5296 Place the chicken thighs in an ovenproof dish and smother with the marinade. Marinade for as long as possible, overnight is great if you have time
16f6a992-5042-4996-b8de-7b72e02c0b43 Prepare the satay sauce by blending the peanut butter, garlic, ginger, soy sauce, 1tsp sesame oil, 1 tbsp vegetable oil honey and warm water to a smooth paste
16f6a992-5042-4996-b8de-7b72e02c0b43 Lightly stir fry the sweet potato slices in the remaining oils until they begin to soften
16f6a992-5042-4996-b8de-7b72e02c0b43 Add the satay sauce to coat the sweet potato and gently heat for a further 1-2 minutes
16f6a992-5042-4996-b8de-7b72e02c0b43 Cook rice as per the instructions on the pack
16f6a992-5042-4996-b8de-7b72e02c0b43 Serve on a bed of the cooked rice topped with the spring onions and toasted nuts
be9000c4-c63f-49b8-b5e8-e71c3173aad1 Prepare the satay sauce by blending the peanut butter, garlic, ginger, soy sauce, sesame oil, vegetable oil honey and warm water to a smooth paste
be9000c4-c63f-49b8-b5e8-e71c3173aad1 Prepare the vegetable skewers by alternating chunks of vegetables– we used small skewers or you can use the larger wooden ones. Makes 16 small or 8 large skewers
be9000c4-c63f-49b8-b5e8-e71c3173aad1 Lightly brush with oil and place the skewers under a medium grill for 5-8 minutes turning regularly – once the vegetables begin to soften brush with the satay sauce.
be9000c4-c63f-49b8-b5e8-e71c3173aad1 Continue to grill, brushing with the sauce and turning until the vegetables are softened and lightly browned
be9000c4-c63f-49b8-b5e8-e71c3173aad1 Serve on a bed of the cooked rice topped with the spring onions and toasted nuts
a12bda54-4f5a-475c-8740-60b5823ff46c Cook the lentils in salted water for 20-30 minutes, drain the water and set aside
a12bda54-4f5a-475c-8740-60b5823ff46c Cook the Pure Basmati as per the instructions on the pack
a12bda54-4f5a-475c-8740-60b5823ff46c Fry the diced onions in coconut oil, until golden
a12bda54-4f5a-475c-8740-60b5823ff46c Transfer the cooked rice to a large bowl and add the lentils, caramelised onions, spices, raisins, pecans and chili oil
a12bda54-4f5a-475c-8740-60b5823ff46c Combine the ingredients and serve hot or allow to cool.
75b83d0e-edf8-4eae-bc8b-04f7d4b7eff1 Make the curry paste by placing the garlic, shallots, ginger, lemongrass, chilies, cumin, half of the coriander into a food processor and blitzing until finely chopped
75b83d0e-edf8-4eae-bc8b-04f7d4b7eff1 Add the lime juice and blitz again
b44ec395-5388-4d8c-bd9e-90a7ab69973a Sauté 1 finely sliced red onion in olive oil until softened.
b44ec395-5388-4d8c-bd9e-90a7ab69973a Heat the Tilda Roasted Vegetable rice in the microwave for 2 minutes, add to pan with 1 small can drained butterbeans & 150g diced, roasted butternut squash.
b44ec395-5388-4d8c-bd9e-90a7ab69973a Add 150ml vegetable stock and allow to absorb.
b44ec395-5388-4d8c-bd9e-90a7ab69973a Stir through freshly chopped parsley and a squeeze of lemon.
337e3046-e933-4375-91e3-764f7afcea8d Cook the rice in boiling water for 25 minutes, before draining and rinsing with cold water.
337e3046-e933-4375-91e3-764f7afcea8d Meanwhile, heat the oil in a frying pan and fry the salmon and mushrooms for 3-4 minutes.
337e3046-e933-4375-91e3-764f7afcea8d Stir in the asparagus, cream cheese, milk and paprika and cook for 1-2 minutes. Season to taste.
337e3046-e933-4375-91e3-764f7afcea8d Combine the chives with the cooked rice and serve with the Salmon Stroganoff
7999b966-0214-46e4-9178-791c39d86da1 Marinade the chicken in half of lemon juice, olive oil and the paprika for 5mins
7999b966-0214-46e4-9178-791c39d86da1 Heat a pan and add the chicken and marinade & cook until golden and cooked through
7999b966-0214-46e4-9178-791c39d86da1 Simmer the rice for 10 minutes in a separate pan of boiling water and drain thoroughly. Once drained add to the pan.
7999b966-0214-46e4-9178-791c39d86da1 Slice the chicken and add by stir well with the pomegranate seeds, lemon zest and remaining lemon juice
7999b966-0214-46e4-9178-791c39d86da1 Heat through for another 2-3 minutes
7999b966-0214-46e4-9178-791c39d86da1 Stir through the coriander and season well with freshly ground black pepper to serve
f1a336ed-a0cf-4189-a64e-000e66eb5719 Decant Tilda Edamame, Spring Onion and Wasabi Pulses & Rice into a mixing bowl.
f1a336ed-a0cf-4189-a64e-000e66eb5719 Lay a sheet of Nori on cling film. Place a quarter of the rice mix across the length of the sheet, approx. one quarter of the way in.
f1a336ed-a0cf-4189-a64e-000e66eb5719 Roll in cling film to form a cylinder shape and close tightly. Repeat with the remaining three sheets of Nori. Place in the fridge to set.
f1a336ed-a0cf-4189-a64e-000e66eb5719 In a bowl mix together the salmon, wasabi, ginger, soy sauce, lemon juice and fresh coriander. Leave in to marinate for 10 minutes before serving.
f1a336ed-a0cf-4189-a64e-000e66eb5719 Cut each sushi cylinder in 6 pieces and place onto plates alternating between little mounts of salmon, topped with the sliced spring onion and sesame seeds.
8e13738f-5395-4a05-b912-f764ced56680 Peel and deseed the pumpkin and chop into 4cm chunks (keep the seeds for roasting later).
1404aad8-dd5c-4550-a9d7-a4a7902412b5 Preheat the oven to 200C.
1404aad8-dd5c-4550-a9d7-a4a7902412b5 Cut the leeks into three sections and then half them. Place the halfs into a roasting tray.
1404aad8-dd5c-4550-a9d7-a4a7902412b5 Mix the coconut milk, fish sauce and turmeric in a jug until combined and them pour into the tray.
1404aad8-dd5c-4550-a9d7-a4a7902412b5 Add the chicken thighs (skin side up) and spinkle a little more turmeric onto the skin. Season with salt and pepper.
1404aad8-dd5c-4550-a9d7-a4a7902412b5 Bake the chicken uncovered for 40-45 minutes until the chicken is cooked through.
1404aad8-dd5c-4550-a9d7-a4a7902412b5 Meanwhile, cook your rice according to the instructions on the packet.
1404aad8-dd5c-4550-a9d7-a4a7902412b5 Once cooked, serve immediately.
